experience.title: Quantitative Analyst Intern
experience.description: - Analyzed and studied the effect of various macro-economic factors on returns of S&P 500 index, quantified their impacts- Developed models to predict index returns by performing regression and statistical analysis in various market scenarios- Successfully implemented the models, achieved an accurate prediction rate of 71% in out of sample testing period

experience.title: Global Alpha Researcher
experience.description: - Developed profitable medium-frequency, market neutral trading signals for various global equity markets- Analyzed the technical and fundamental data of firms for trading statistical arbitrage opportunities in global equities- Investigated and implemented recent academic research to identify potentially profitable market inefficiencies

projects: [{"title":"Artificial Neural Network Modelling","start_date":"Jul 2018","end_date":"Dec 2018","description":"Programmed a dual hidden layer feed-forward neural network model to predict the optimal operating conditions for a desalination sweeping gas membrane distillation membrane"},{"title":"Efficient Route in a Road Network","start_date":"Mar 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"- Represented a traffic network model(with roads and junctions) via Graphs in C++ with options to add or demolish road/road-junction- Implemented 'Dijsktra's Algorithm' and 'Minimum Spanning Tree' using Priority Queue to find spanning & quickest travel route"},{"title":"Market Data Publisher via AVL Tree","start_date":"Feb 2018","end_date":"Mar 2018","description":"- Implemented AVL tree structure in C++ with a parameter maintaining data operations like insertion and deletion- Published and updated price associated with the Company ID if minimum threshold regarding price change is met"},{"title":"Web page connectivity info via Sparse matrices","start_date":"Feb 2018","end_date":"Mar 2018","description":"- Implemented part of the PageRank algorithm used in Google Search Engine handling large-order web connectivity- Performed multiple operations on billions of web pagesâ€™ data stored in the sparse matrix via Multiple Circular Linked list in C++"},{"title":"Numerical Solution of Vintage Capital Growth Models","start_date":"Sep 2016","end_date":"Nov 2016","description":"-Examined techniques for the analytical and numerical solutions of the Solow's Vintage Capital Growth Model.-Solved and analyzed the differential - difference type equations formulated in the mathematical models on MATLAB.-Predicted the production outcome by extending the Solow's Model by including the labor function and time function."}]
